LanguageData.WNA_AbilityInvisibility.label: invisibility
LanguageData.WNA_AbilityInvisibility.description: This pawn is hidden beyond sights.
LanguageData.WNA_AbilityWisdom.label: bestowed wisdom
LanguageData.WNA_AbilityWisdom.description: This pawn is bestowed with wisdom by a Whelingnorther Saint.
LanguageData.WNA_Disabled.label: disabled
LanguageData.WNA_Disabled.description: The trauma after experiencing psylink deprivation without psylink. Commonly this condition can recover in 3 days or so.
LanguageData.WNA_PsychicTrauma.label: psychic trauma
LanguageData.WNA_PsychicTrauma.description: The trauma after experiencing psylink deprivation with psylink.
LanguageData.WNA_PsychicTrauma.comps.HediffComp_Surge: Due to the brutal psychic deprivation {PAWN_nameDef} have experienced, {PAWN_nameDef} is suffering from severe psychic trauma and become incapacitied. Whether {PAWN_nameDef} can recover from this condition is uncertain.
